languages.text: "Руолдо тоже клеймили, и он не знал об этом, потому и обрек себя на смерть. Вероятно, это дело рук скомороха — вопрос лишь в том, действовал шут по своей воле, или за ним стоит кто-то более значимый".

"Ruoldo was branded too. He couldn't have known, or else he would not have doomed himself like that. I assume this is likewise the work of that buffoon — the only question is whether he was acting of his own accord or at the behest of someone more important."
languages.original_text: "Руолдо тоже клеймили, и он не знал об этом, потому и обрек себя на смерть. Вероятно, это дело рук скомороха — вопрос лишь в том, действовал шут по своей воле, или за ним стоит кто-то более значимый".

traits.locale_text: "Ruoldo was branded too. He couldn't have known, or else he would not have doomed himself like that. I assume this is likewise the work of that buffoon — the only question is whether he was acting of his own accord or at the behest of someone more important."

"Ruoldo was branded too. He couldn't have known, or else he would not have doomed himself like that. I assume this is likewise the work of that buffoon — the only question is whether he was acting of his own accord or at the behest of someone more important."

languages.text: 「ルオルドも刻印を押されていました。本人にその自覚があったとは思えません。知っていたなら、自ら破滅に向かうような真似はしなかったはずです。これもあの道化の仕業でしょう。ただ問題は、彼が単独に動いたのか、それとも更に大物の指図を受けていたのかということです」
languages.original_text: "Ruoldo was branded too. He couldn't have known, or else he would not have doomed himself like that. I assume this is likewise the work of that buffoon — the only question is whether he was acting of his own accord or at the behest of someone more important."

traits.locale_text: 「ルオルドも刻印を押されていました。本人にその自覚があったとは思えません。知っていたなら、自ら破滅に向かうような真似はしなかったはずです。これもあの道化の仕業でしょう。ただ問題は、彼が単独に動いたのか、それとも更に大物の指図を受けていたのかということです」

languages.text: "Ruoldo war auch markiert. Er kann es nicht gewusst haben, sonst hätte er sich nicht selbst zum Tod verdammt. Ich nehme an, auch das ist das Werk dieses Dummkopfs – bleibt nur die Frage, ob er eigenverantwortlich gehandelt hat oder auf Anweisung von jemand Wichtigerem."
languages.original_text: "Ruoldo was branded too. He couldn't have known, or else he would not have doomed himself like that. I assume this is likewise the work of that buffoon — the only question is whether he was acting of his own accord or at the behest of someone more important."

traits.locale_text: "Ruoldo war auch markiert. Er kann es nicht gewusst haben, sonst hätte er sich nicht selbst zum Tod verdammt. Ich nehme an, auch das ist das Werk dieses Dummkopfs – bleibt nur die Frage, ob er eigenverantwortlich gehandelt hat oder auf Anweisung von jemand Wichtigerem."

languages.text: «Ruoldo también había sido marcado. No era consciente de ello, porque no se habría condenado de ese modo. Imagino que esto también es obra del bufón. La única duda es si lo ha hecho por cuenta propia o por orden de alguien más importante».
languages.original_text: "Ruoldo was branded too. He couldn't have known, or else he would not have doomed himself like that. I assume this is likewise the work of that buffoon — the only question is whether he was acting of his own accord or at the behest of someone more important."

traits.locale_text: «Ruoldo también había sido marcado. No era consciente de ello, porque no se habría condenado de ese modo. Imagino que esto también es obra del bufón. La única duda es si lo ha hecho por cuenta propia o por orden de alguien más importante».

languages.text: “罗尔多确实也被打上了烙印。他应该不知道，否则他不会让自己落得这样的下场。我猜，这多半也是那个小丑干的。唯一的问题是，那个小丑是自己打算这么干的，还是受了某个更重要的人物指使？”
languages.original_text: "Ruoldo was branded too. He couldn't have known, or else he would not have doomed himself like that. I assume this is likewise the work of that buffoon — the only question is whether he was acting of his own accord or at the behest of someone more important."

traits.locale_text: “罗尔多确实也被打上了烙印。他应该不知道，否则他不会让自己落得这样的下场。我猜，这多半也是那个小丑干的。唯一的问题是，那个小丑是自己打算这么干的，还是受了某个更重要的人物指使？”

languages.text: "Ruoldo da damgalanmış. Bilemezdi tabii, yoksa böyle kendini mahvetmezdi. Bunun da o şaklabanın işi olduğunu düşünüyorum. Asıl merak ettiğim, bunu kendi başına mı yaptı yoksa daha önemli birinin emriyle mi hareket ediyordu?"
languages.original_text: "Ruoldo was branded too. He couldn't have known, or else he would not have doomed himself like that. I assume this is likewise the work of that buffoon — the only question is whether he was acting of his own accord or at the behest of someone more important."

traits.locale_text: "Ruoldo da damgalanmış. Bilemezdi tabii, yoksa böyle kendini mahvetmezdi. Bunun da o şaklabanın işi olduğunu düşünüyorum. Asıl merak ettiğim, bunu kendi başına mı yaptı yoksa daha önemli birinin emriyle mi hareket ediyordu?"

languages.text: « Ruoldo a également été marqué. Il ne pouvait pas le savoir ou il ne serait jamais condamné à un tel sort. Je présume que c'est encore l'œuvre de ce bouffon. Reste la question de savoir s'il agissait de son propre chef ou sous les ordres de quelqu'un de plus important. »
languages.original_text: "Ruoldo was branded too. He couldn't have known, or else he would not have doomed himself like that. I assume this is likewise the work of that buffoon — the only question is whether he was acting of his own accord or at the behest of someone more important."

traits.locale_text: « Ruoldo a également été marqué. Il ne pouvait pas le savoir ou il ne serait jamais condamné à un tel sort. Je présume que c'est encore l'œuvre de ce bouffon. Reste la question de savoir s'il agissait de son propre chef ou sous les ordres de quelqu'un de plus important. »
